text: Jules Albert Wijdenbosch (2 May 1942 - 30 April 2025) was a Surinamese politician. He was President of Suriname from 1996 to 2000. He was a member of the National Democratic Party. He was Prime Minister from April 1987 until January 1988, Vice President from January 1991 until September 1991. Wijdenbosch died in Paramaribo on 30 April 2025 at the age of 83. ==References== Wijdensboch, Jules Category:2025 deaths Category:Presidents of Suriname Category:Prime Ministers of Suriname
title: Jules Wijdenbosch
